text: Sounds good Micaela! Thanks for your understanding with my super delayed response. Glad to hear you had a nice time in Argentina and felt like you got a break from stress. Good luck with the Goodbye Kansas interview! I met a recruiter from their Sweden location a few years back when I was still at Framestore and attending a recruitment event on their behalf in Sweden. His name is Anders Singstedt, and I think he's still there and is a "Talent Acquisition Manager". I don't know if it would help, but let me know if you'd like me to reach out to him on LinkedIn to put a good word in for you?

Thanks! I think it went well, I am happy with how it was so let’s see, they told me they would get back to me in a week or so. I would be so grateful if you put a good word for me, I don’t know how it works in this industry with that but I think everything is helpful in this cases. Thank you again!:grin:
